greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle generated by Pascal's rule, except begin and end the n-th row with n!.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..100 of table, flattened
program: (PARI) t(n, k) = {if (k<1 || k>n, return (0)); if (k==1 || k==n, return (n!)); return (t(n-1, k-1) + t(n-1, k));}
tabl(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, n, print1(t(n, k), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 19 2013
results.author: _Joseph L. Pe_, Oct 01 2002
